game.name: Suborbital Salvage
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fly through a dangerous, hazard-filled orbit where every run is a lesson that sharpens your flight skills. Featuring procedurally generated runs built from hand-crafted segments that demand precision piloting to outpace a persistent space predator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fly through a dangerous, hazard-filled orbit where every run is a lesson that sharpens your flight skills. Featuring procedurally generated runs built from hand-crafted segments that demand precision piloting to outpace a persistent space predator.
